title: ILinearPatternFeatureData.D1EndRefOffset
description: Gets or sets the distance of the last pattern instance from the up-to reference geometry in Direction 1 of this linear pattern feature.
returns: Offset of last pattern instance from ILinearPatternFeatureData::D1EndReference
remarks:
This property is valid only if
ILinearPatternFeatureData::D1EndCondition
is set to
swPatternEndCondition_e
.swPatternEndCondition_UpToReference.
Whether to offset instance geometry or a centroid is governed by
ILinearPatternFeatureData::D1EndUseSeedReference
.
